text: John Wesley Gibbs (August 26, 1915 – April 22, 1982) was an American professional basketball player. He played for the Flint Dow A.C.'s in the National Basketball League (NBL) in two games during 1947–48. He was the younger brother of NBL player Jim Gibbs. ==References== Category:1915 births Category:1982 deaths Category:American men's basketball players Category:Basketball players from Missouri Category:Central Missouri Mules basketball players Category:Flint Dow A.C.'s players Category:Guards (basketball) Category:High school basketball coaches in the United States Category:Oklahoma State Cowboys basketball players Category:People from Wayne County, Missouri Category:Professional Basketball League of America players
title: John Gibbs (basketball)
